SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: Providing indoor sports facility and programs to Newtown area youth and amateur sports teams and leagues.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: The Organization provides low cost indoor playing space to individual and athletic teams in the community in order to teach athletics and provide community activities for youth and young adults

CashDeemedCharitableExplnStmt.ShortExplanationTxt: The foundation operates a sports facility that had over $1,496,000 in cash expenses for calendar year 2022 plus $7,800 in capital additions totaling $1,503,800. One-twelfth of that amount is $125,000 which the foundation keeps on hand to pay operating expenses.
